title: Shy and confident lines
prompt: Draw a line that is very shy. Then draw one that is too confident.

title: Late line
prompt: Draw a line that is late for school.

title: Lines avoiding each other
prompt: Draw two lines that are trying not to touch each other.

title: Sleepy line
prompt: Draw a line that slowly falls asleep.

title: Edge-scared line
prompt: Draw a line that is scared of the edge of the paper.

title: Indecisive line
prompt: Draw a line that keeps changing its mind.

title: Nervous calm line
prompt: Draw a line that pretends to be calm but is actually nervous.

title: Rule-breaking line
prompt: Draw a line that breaks the rules halfway through.

title: Almost a shape
prompt: Draw a line that wants to become a shape but never fully does.

title: Bad copy
prompt: Draw a line that is copying another line badly.

title: One-line shoe
prompt: Draw your shoe using one continuous line. Do not lift your pen.

title: Blind hand
prompt: Draw your hand without looking at your paper.

title: Empty spaces
prompt: Draw only the empty spaces inside and around a chair.

title: Upside-down object
prompt: Draw an object upside down.

title: Slow pencil
prompt: Draw your pencil, starting at the eraser end, very slowly.

title: Too big
prompt: Draw an object so big it does not fit on the page.

title: Dots only
prompt: Draw something in front of you using only dots.

title: Memory check
prompt: Draw an object from memory, then look at it and add what you missed.

title: Fast then slow
prompt: Draw the same object twice: once very fast, once very slow.

title: Inside only
prompt: Draw an object without drawing its outline. Show only the inside details.

title: Banana slip
prompt: Draw someone slipping on a banana peel.

title: Late run
prompt: Draw a person running because they are late.

title: Heavy load
prompt: Draw someone carrying something very heavy.

title: Jumping puddle
prompt: Draw a person jumping over a puddle. Do not draw the face.

title: Quiet chaos
prompt: Draw someone trying to stay quiet in a noisy place.

title: Morning stretch
prompt: Draw a person stretching after waking up.

title: Suspicious door
prompt: Draw someone opening a door they do not trust.

title: Secret dance
prompt: Draw a person dancing when they think nobody is watching.

title: Standing nap
prompt: Draw a person falling asleep while standing.

title: Chase
prompt: Draw a person chasing something that keeps escaping.

title: Impossible feature
prompt: Draw a normal object with one impossible feature.

title: Classroom animal
prompt: Draw an animal that secretly lives in your classroom.

title: Rebel chair
prompt: Draw a chair that does not want to be sat on.

title: Living backpack
prompt: Draw a backpack that is alive.

title: Strange behavior
prompt: Draw an object that looks normal but behaves strangely.

title: Opposite tool
prompt: Draw a tool that does the opposite of its job.

title: Mashup
prompt: Draw an animal mixed with a classroom object.

title: Small problem machine
prompt: Draw a machine that solves a very small problem.

title: Alien version
prompt: Draw a familiar object as if it were from another planet.

title: One surprise
prompt: Draw something ordinary. Add one thing that makes it surprising.
